pages.heading: Holy Water
pages.text: Temporarily increases the melee damage dealt to undead mobs by +5. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords.$(br2)Applies: Holy Light I (256 hits)

pages.heading: Holy Water L
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Holy Light I (1024 hits)

pages.heading: Holy Water II
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment increases melee damage dealt to undead mobs by +10. $(br2)Applies: Holy Light II (256 hits)

pages.heading: Holy Water XL
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts sixteen times longer. $(br2)Applies: Holy Light I (4096 hits)

pages.heading: Holy Water III
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment increases melee damage dealt to undead mobs by +15. $(br2)Applies: Holy Light III (256 hits)
